summary: Simon, re: Baldur's Gate 3 winning Best Community Support award
mainText: 'The most important award, congrats!'

summary: Simon, re: Acorn saying he's starving for a blogpost
mainText: 'Confused cat zoom gif'

summary: Simon posts picture of Reddoons' in-game model
mainText: 'PICTURE'

summary: Simon, re: new interview tomorrow
mainText: 'BR community, donâ€™t miss this one! Big news in there!'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: parental controls
mainText: 'We have a base level implementation already for account signups, when the game launches we will have a more indepth parental control system to enable and toggle features such as chat or ability to join servers.'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: user asking if Hytale can share the email they signed up with due to confusion
mainText: 'We can't disclose that for privacy reasons :( however I recommend checking what emails you got the verification email on and logging into those accounts'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: email issues
mainText: 'We have collected a bunch of information since my tweet last night, we're working with the provider to figure out why there are delays on delivery. We will update once this is resolved.'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: if kids should be under the parents' account
mainText: 'No, kids accounts and profiles should remain separate from a parental account, the game should be purchased on the childs account but parental control for game features will remain on the parent account.'

summary: Ktar, re: 'line' option/tool in Hytale
mainText: 'Yeah! It needs some additional work to be a perfect implementation, but it exists and is good enough right now.'

summary: Buddha, re: @Mosshorn saying they signed a document in 2023 to have a model shown in the next fanart showcase, but it never happened
mainText: 'We need to make that right ðŸ˜­'

summary: Simon, re: Hypixel Network's Ravengard minigame blogpost
mainText: 'this is crazy, gg'

summary: Simon, re: DarthMicroT wanting 'Blight' minigame in Hytale
mainText:
'Was watching your PoE 2 0.4 Fate of the Vaal build and plan video as I saw this tweetðŸ˜…
This might mean something. We need more PoE-inspired mechanicsðŸ¤”'

summary: Simon, re: Slamma wanting Hytale Fan Art Showcase Blogposts brought back
mainText: 'We will feature a ton of fan art/content, yes! Very excited to do so, I've seen some crazy good stuff!'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: age verification issues
mainText: 'We're aware of an issue affecting certain mobile users, please try desktop while we work to resolve'

summary: Oscar, re: Hytale OST on Spotify
mainText: 'Working on it:)'

summary: Buddha, re: Slamma wanting Hytale Fan Art Showcase Blogposts brought back
mainText: 'This would be amazing to bring back! Will likely be post-release like you mentioned, but we have a few ideas on how we could showcase the incredible art from our community :)'

summary: Dep, re: user saying their reserved name was revoked
mainText: 'Hey, I just checked our database. vaan is still under the same acct that initially reserved the name on Tues. Could be Google signed you in with the wrong account when you reserved, sometimes Google just decides which one to use. Tokens aren't tied to the email they were sent to'

summary: Oscar, re: LegitHytaleLeaks saying Hytale servers are not running on a potato
mainText: 'This hasn't been confirmed'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: email issue dms
mainText: 'Thank you for all the messages, we're going to continue looking into it and working with providers to get this resolved ASAP'

summary: Simon, re: original The Walls pvp minigame map
mainText: 'Good memories making this map back in like 2012!'

summary: Simon, re: adventure maps
mainText:
'Adventure maps are going to be insane!
I would make one myself if I had time, but gonna make adventures in the base game first :P'

summary: Simon, re: hunger games
mainText: 'this would go hard'

summary: Simon, re: minigames
mainText: 'What minigames do you want us or the community to make in Hytale?'

summary: Simon, re: minigames
mainText:
'What minigames do you want the us or the community to make in Hytale?'

(EDITED to next tweet)

summary: DevSlashNull, re: name reservation removed error
mainText: 'Can you double check and make sure you're logged into the same account that you reserved it on, are you sure you havent made a second account by mistake?'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: choosing username during preorders
mainText: 'Yes when you purchase your license you will get a randomly generated name, after that you can apply a new name if its not reserved or your reserved name to the profile.'

summary: DevSlashNull, re: verification email issues
mainText: 'If you're having issues getting your verification email for your Hytale account please shoot me a DM with your email, we're trying to narrow down the cause with providers.'

summary: Simon, re: controller/joystick support
mainText: 'Only keyboard mouse but high priority for controllers post launch'
